title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6026 - Pre-employment Police Training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6026 - Pre-employment Police Training

State Regulations
§ 6026.1 - Definitions
§ 6026.2 - Statement of purpose
§ 6026.3 - Minimum standards for approval of a pre-employment police basic training course
§ 6026.4 - Requirements for approval of a pre-employment police training school
§ 6026.5 - Revocation or suspension of approval of a pre-employment police training school
§ 6026.6 - Term and renewal of pre-employment police training school approval
§ 6026.7 - Requirements for conducting a pre-employment police basic training course
§ 6026.8 - Requirements for completion of a pre-employment police basic training course
§ 6026.9 - Limitations regarding pre-employment police basic training courses

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6026

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§840, 842

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
